properties.Label: Creekside Trail Bridge Replacement
properties.ProjectTitle: Creekside Trail Bridge Replacement / New Project
properties.ProjectDescription: Replace the existing suspension bridge over Blackwater Creek connecting the Blackwater Creekside Trail to the Beaver Trail . This project will demolish the old bridge and build a newbridge similar to the upstream bridge completed several years ago.
properties.DepartmentPriority: Project required to support important but not essential services

properties.Label: Miller Park Retaining Wall Restoration
properties.ProjectTitle: Miller Park Retaining Wall Restoration / New Project
properties.ProjectDescription: Architectural and engineering geotechnical investigation of historic stone retaining wall along Park Avenue resulting in design drawings, specifications, bid documents, and construction.
properties.DepartmentPriority: Project required to support important but not essential services

properties.Label: Daniel's Hill Center Renovation
properties.ProjectTitle: Daniel's Hill Neighborhood Center Renovation / New Project

properties.Label: Riverside Park Overlook Restoration

properties.Label: Miller Park Pool Assessments
